item.title: Data from: Density triggers maternal hormones that increase adaptive offspring growth in a wild mammal
item.description: Sources Background Reproducibility Effect of spruce cone availability on local density (Fig. 1B) Effect of Density on growth rate (Fig. 2/Table S2) Reproducibility Red flags Growth rate is a change score and is confounding by the basline Figure 2 doesn’t make sense Effect of Density on fecal cortisol metabolites (Fig. 3/Table S4) Reproducibility Red flags one-tailed tests Forking paths Confounding Density and Treatment in Fig 3A,B/Table S4 What is effect of ignoring Chickadee manipulation in Fig 3C/Table S4 Justification for using chickadee playback as “Control” Summary of Red Flags for Figure 3/Table S4 Effect of FCM on offspring growth rate (Table S5) Reproducibility Explore Red flags small effect in obersvational design Table S5 CIs How is FCM “corrected?
